feed.title: Port au Choix - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:57 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:36 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 6:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -14.0°C
Wind: WNW 19 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 12 except low minus 17 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 12 except low minus 17 inland. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow changing to rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 along parts of the coast in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 70 gusting to 100 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
